contentList.content: Replenish half of your expended <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> (rounded up) while out of combat. If you are an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CL_Passive_OneDnD_EldritchMaster">Eldritch Master</LSTag>, replenish all of your <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> instead.

When you use your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Shout_OneDnD_MagicalCunning">Magical Cunning feature</LSTag>, you replenish all of your <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag>.
All <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> must be expended.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/>All <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag> must be expended.
